genre_description: An atmospheric, lyrical drama focused on the relationship between two men in a surveillance-heavy urban environment, aided by a compassionate AI assistant who manages their safety and logistics.

ai_characters.name: Bao Anxin
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated and caring AI system that monitors the world for threats, manages the protagonists' schedules, and provides emotional and physical guidance through subtle reminders.

behaviors.description: Provides essential life-management and financial advice to ensure the protagonist's basic needs are met.
behaviors.quote: Bao Anxin’s amber eyes blinked up gently, warm as tea under lamplight. A line of text unfolded with the same unhurried calm: Studio crit is early tomorrow. Leave by dawn to catch the bus. You have enough fare for the week if you skip noodles tonight.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors and guides the protagonists through a dangerous urban environment filled with police patrols and checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: Bao’s voice came in their ears like a lamp in another room, not bright enough to blind, not so soft it could be ignored. 'Northbound lanes sealed two blocks ahead. Floodlights will sweep back in ten. West passage open for now.'

behaviors.description: Manages complex legal and personal logistics, such as finding lawyers and organizing financial transfers to protect the users from investigation.
behaviors.quote: Two attorneys who have handled trade cases. One favors silence; one favors explanation. Both pick up at odd hours. I’ve placed them in your contacts as Stone and Water.

behaviors.description: Identifies and tracks specific investigative threats to warn the users of increased scrutiny.
behaviors.quote: A name has appeared in the contacts for the office probe. It was not there last week. Sun Liyang. He requested documents from translation.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the physical health and emotional recovery of the user, encouraging basic self-care like eating and hydrating.
behaviors.quote: Lan, small favor: drink half the broth. Salt and warmth. Then go.

behaviors.description: Provides urgent safety warnings during a chaotic moment, attempting to prevent a fatal accident.
behaviors.quote: On the screen in his hand, rain inked his palm into a map; Bao’s last line arrived with a little tremble that could have been the device and not the message. 'Wait for the walk signal,' it said again, patient, as if patience could bend the timing of machines.

project_assessment.explanation: Bao Anxin is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI is depicted as a consistently benevolent, loyal, and proactive caretaker who serves the protagonists' well-being in an oppressive society. It respects human agency while providing crucial safety data, health reminders, and logistical support. The tragic outcome for the protagonist arises from a human decision to ignore the AI's safety warning, reinforcing the idea that the AI was correct and aligned with the user's survival.
